sourcesContent:
Esta es la Fotos Page

Contenido de la Fotos Page

{{image.dsc}}

import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {Foto} from "../../models/foto.model"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-fotos-page', templateUrl: './fotos-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fotos-page.component.css'] }) export class FotosPageComponent { constructor( private readonly router: Router ) { } images: Foto[] = [ {id: 1, img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 1'}, {id: 2, img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 2'}, {id: 3, img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 3'}, {id: 4, img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 4'}, {id: 5, img: 'https://picsum.photos/200/300', dsc: 'Foto de prova 5'} ]; verImagen(image: Foto): void { this.router.navigate(['/product-details', image.id]); } }
